suite.name: Carrinhos Tests

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=http://localhost:3000/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Random Int
kw.doc: Generate a random integer between two integers ``min`` and ``max`` inclusive while observing the provided ``step`` value.

kw.name: Sentence
kw.msg: ${descricao} = Doctor early city partner light message product.

kw.name: Random Int
kw.doc: Generate a random integer between two integers ``min`` and ``max`` inclusive while observing the provided ``step`` value.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: ${produtos} = {'nome': 'Stephanie Holloway', 'preco': 2685, 'descricao': 'Doctor early city partner light message product.', 'quantidade': 902}

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: ${produtos} = {'nome': 'Stephanie Holloway', 'preco': 2685, 'descricao': 'Doctor early city partner light message product.', 'quantidade': 902}

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3000/carrinhos path_url=/carrinhos headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Authorization': 'Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJlbWFpbCI6ImZ1bGFub0BxYS5jb20iLCJwYXNzd29yZCI6InRlc3RlIiwiaWF0IjoxNjU3NjQzMTUyLCJleHAiOjE2NTc2NDM3NTJ9.K8zYu6CRw1oUWsOC40qybdH-ew8atZDKOozvAXircVc', 'Content-Length': '108', 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'} body=nome=Stephanie+Holloway&preco=2685&descricao=Doctor+early+city+partner+light+message+product.&quantidade=902

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.
